reference.Refstring: Dalpiaz, F., Schalk, I. V. D., & Lucassen, G. (2018, March). Pinpointing ambiguity and incompleteness in requirements engineering via information visualization and NLP. In International Working Conference on Requirements Engineering: Foundation for Software Quality (pp. 119-135). Springer, Cham.

descriptions.definition: "A requirement is ambiguous when it has multiple valid interpretations"
